entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 9.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers in the evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 17 April 2023
